query.statement: SELECT '177508' AS PSPID, '설치1팀' AS TM, '강북' AS LIFNR_NM, '164045L13' AS POSID, '세운6-3구역 오피스빌딩1' AS ZSITENM, 'HSVF' AS TYPE, 'PS24-1SCO180-11/10' AS SAYANG, '미교체' AS CHG_YN, '34' AS CNT, '공정보기' AS BTN FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 UNION ALL SELECT '177508','설치1팀','강북','164045L14','세운6-4구역 오피스빌딩2','HSVF','PS24-1SCO180-11/11','교체','35','공정보기' FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 UNION ALL SELECT '177508','설치1팀','강북','164045L15','세운6-3구역 오피스빌딩2','HSVF','PS24-1SCO180-11/12','미교체','36','공정보기' FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 UNION ALL SELECT '177508','설치1팀','강북','164045L16','세운6-4구역 오피스빌딩3','HSVF','PS24-1SCO180-11/13','교체','37','공정보기' FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 UNION ALL SELECT '177508','설치1팀','강북','164045L17','세운6-3구역 오피스빌딩3','HSVF','PS24-1SCO180-11/14','미교체','38','공정보기' FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 UNION ALL SELECT '177508','설치1팀','강북','164045L18','세운6-4구역 오피스빌딩4','HSVF','PS24-1SCO180-11/15','교체','39','공정보기' FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 UNION ALL SELECT '177508','설치1팀','강북','164045L19','세운6-3구역 오피스빌딩4','HSVF','PS24-1SCO180-11/16','미교체','40','공정보기' FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 UNION ALL SELECT '177508','설치1팀','강북','164045L20','세운6-4구역 오피스빌딩5','HSVF','PS24-1SCO180-11/17','교체','41','공정보기' FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 UNION ALL SELECT '177508','설치1팀','강북','164045L21','세운6-3구역 오피스빌딩5','HSVF','PS24-1SCO180-11/18','미교체','42','공정보기' FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
